welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Isla de Maipo, Chile! Nestled in the beautiful Maipo Valley, our charming city is known for its scenic vineyards and warm hospitality. We invite you to explore and experience all that our city has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal of Arturo Merino Benitez Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A newer terminal primarily used by low-cost airlines for domestic and regional flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: A small terminal used for general aviation and private flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport, but may have limited speed and access in certain areas.
